message: Bob, I'm confident this product will be a game-changer for you.  I'm offering it to you at a very attractive price of $1,200,000.  Let's work together to make this a win-win scenario.
I appreciate your confidence in the product, Alice. However, I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,100,000. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I'm eager to make this deal work,  $1,100,000 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000.  Let's find a solution that benefits us both.
I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers at $1,125,000. Can you consider this offer?
